low.html: At-risk individuals and general population should enjoy their usual outdoor activities.

moderate.html: Adults and children with lung problems and those with heart problems who experience symptoms should consider reducing strenuous physical activity, particularly outdoors..
General population could enjoy their usual outdoor activities.

high.html: Adults and children with lung problems and those with heart problems who experience symptoms should avoid strenuous physical activity, particularly outdoors
People with asthma may need to use their reliever inhaler more often.
Anyone from general population experiencing discomfort such as sore eyes, cough or sore throat should consider reducingÂ activity, particularly outdoors.

very_high.html: Adults and children with lung problems and those with heart problems who experience symptoms should avoid strenuous physical activity, particularly outdoors
People with asthma may need to use their reliever inhaler more often.
General population should reduce physical exertion, particularly outdoors, especially if experiencing cough or sore throat symptoms.

low.html: Individuals suffering hay fever or allergies should enjoy their usual outdoor activities.

moderate.html: Individuals suffering hay fever or allergies should stay indoors with doors and windows shut, if possible.

high.html: Individuals suffering hay fever or allergies should stay indoors with doors and windows shut, if possible.

very_high.html: Individuals suffering hay fever or allergies should stay indoors with doors and windows shut, if possible.
